title: Luther on War against the Turks MCQ 3

content.question: A historian interpreting the passage would most likely explain that the audience of the sermon is an illustration of the fact that

choices.label: papal alliances with the Holy Roman emperors led to widespread religious persecutions in Germany
the Protestant German nobility was wary of confronting the Ottomans without Catholic support
political support from the German nobility aided in the development of the early Protestant community
the Protestant German nobility adopted pacifist attitudes during religious disputes with their Catholic and Muslim opponents

content.answer: political support from the German nobility aided in the development of the early Protestant community

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
